subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Russell Carter, the Big East’s second-leading scorer, is the Irish’s most temperamental player as well as their hardest worker. He scored a career-high 32 last week in a loss against St. John’s.
snippet: Russell Carter, the Big East’s second-leading scorer, is the Irish’s most temperamental player as well as their hardest worker. He scored a career-high 32 last week in a loss against St. John’s.
